name: DENTAL_ORTHODONTICS
description: Table for storing Orthodontics Episode items such as Treatment Scope, Treatment Start Date, etc.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the episode record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ORTHO_BANDING_DATE
columns.description: Date on which the brackets or bands were placed on patient's teeth.

columns.name: ORTHO_END_DATE
columns.description: Date on which the last phase of an orthodontic treatment ends.

columns.name: ORTHO_ESTIMATED_LENGTH
columns.description: Estimated number of months an orthodontic treatment would last.

columns.name: ORTHO_TX_SCOPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The current scope of orthodontic treatment.

columns.name: ORTHO_EPSD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Status of the episode in terms of "Ongoing", "Pending", or "Discontinued".

columns.name: ORTHO_EPSD_STATUS_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Reason why an orthodontics episode is pending or discontinued.
entries: Other adverse effects of orthodontic treatment

columns.name: ORTHO_MODIFIED_INST_DTTM
columns.description: History item that tracks every instant an orthodontic episode has been modified.

columns.name: ORTHO_MODIFIED_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user that modified orthodontics data for this history line.

columns.name: ORTHO_MODIFIED_CSN
columns.description: Stores the contact CSN where data was modified for this history line.

columns.name: ORTHO_STATUS_COMMENT
columns.description: Comment on why an orthodontics episode status is paused or discontinued.

columns.name: ORTHO_TX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the status of the orthodontic treatment.
